data.name: Cradle of Sins VR
data.detailed_description:
Virtual Reality MOBA


Cradle of Sins is a strategy focused first-person MOBA game developed exclusively for AR & VR. The game features all the best AR/VR and MOBA elements, such as joystick/trackpad movement, natural locomotion for sprinting, interactive world, physics driven combat system, jungles, two lanes and 10 playable characters with unique abilities and over 70 weapons. No two games will have the same outcome.

About the game


The game is played in matches between two teams of three players with each team defending their own separate Altar on the map. Each of the players independently control a powerful character. The game features 10 unique characters at release, each of which has their own unique weapons, abilities and upgrades. Different weapons ranging from swords, crossbows, shields, staffs and powerful crystals. Players have a passive income of gold and get rewards for killing enemies across the map. This gold can be used to buy weapons and upgrades to successfully battle the opposing team's character in player versus player combat. A team wins by being the first to destroy a large structure located in the opposing team's base.

data.short_description: Cradle of Sins is a strategy focused first-person MOBA game for VR. Boasting a distinctive world with a variety of unique characters and weapons. Choose your own play-style and turn the tide of victory in your favor.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Window 7 – 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Quad Core 3 Ghz +
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 970 / Radeon R9 290
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Window 10 – 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Quad Core 3 Ghz +
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 980 ti or GTX 1070
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 6 GB available space

Minimum:

mac_requirements.recommended:
